text: Colleagues () is a 1962 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksey Sakharov.Путин и Мишустин поздравили Василия Ливанова с юбилеемКоллеги It stars Vasily Livanov, Vasily Lanovoy, and Oleg Anofriyev. == Actors == * Vasily Livanov as Sasha Zelenin * Vasily Lanovoy as Aleksey Maksimov * Oleg Anofriyev as Vladka Karpov * Nina Shatskaya as Inna * Tamara Syomina as Dasha Guryanova * Rostislav Plyatt as Dampfer == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1962 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Colleagues (movie)
